items.content_html: React Carousel is a fully customizable and lightweight carousel component built for React applications. It provides smooth transitions, autoplay, infinite scrolling, and navigation controls, making it easy to integrate into any project.

items.content_html: Prayer Times API is a lightweight Node.js REST API that provides accurate Islamic prayer times based on geographic coordinates. It utilizes the Adhan.js library to calculate prayer times using various calculation methods, including Umm Al-Qura, Muslim World League, and more.
items.title: ADIMYY/prayer-times-api: Prayer Times API is a lightweight Node.js REST API that provides accurate Islamic prayer times based on geographic coordinates. It utilizes the Adhan.js library to calculate prayer times using various calculation methods, including Umm Al-Qura, Muslim World League, and more.

items.content_html: NewsApp is a modern, lightweight, and responsive web application built with React and Vite. It fetches the latest news articles from a news API and displays them in a clean and user-friendly interface. The application leverages Bootstrap for styling and provides a seamless user experience with fast loading times and efficient state management.
items.title: govanidaksh04/NewsApp: NewsApp is a modern, lightweight, and responsive web application built with React and Vite. It fetches the latest news articles from a news API and displays them in a clean and user-friendly interface. The application leverages Bootstrap for styling and provides a seamless user experience with fast loading times and efficient state management.
